files.description: Main EHI Tables Export page on HubSpot. Contains overview text explaining the CSV export format and four CTA buttons linking to component-specific documentation (Juno EHR, RxTracker, ConnectEHR/CQMsolution, Patient Portal).

Juno EHR Export Schema — index page listing 1,256 database tables with links to individual table documentation pages. This is the primary data dictionary for the core EHR CSV export. Organized alphabetically A-V. Each table links to a separate HTML page with field-level detail (column name, type, description, primary/foreign keys). Hosted on Azure blob storage.

RxTracker Export Schema — index page listing 66 database tables for the e-prescribing/pharmacy module. Same structure as the Juno EHR dictionary. Covers patients, prescriptions, medication orders, encounters, allergies, problems, reconciliations, and related pharmacy workflow data.

ConnectEHR & CQMsolution EHI Export page. Describes ConnectEHR C-CDA 2.x export (single-patient and bulk, scheduled or on-demand) and CQMsolution QRDA I XML export. Both certified to (b)(10) under limited ePHI USCDIv1 definition. Includes step-by-step extraction instructions.

Patient Portal EHI Export page. Describes C-CDA format export for single-patient and patient population downloads. Certified to (b)(10) under USCDIv1 definition. Includes step-by-step report extraction process.
Full-page screenshot of the main EHI Tables Export page showing the overview text and four CTA buttons (Juno EHR, Juno RxTracker, Juno ConnectEHR & CQMsolution, Juno Patient Portal).
Screenshot of the top of the Juno EHR Export Schema page showing the title, alphabetical index navigation (A-Z), and the beginning of the table listing under section A.

Screenshot of a sample individual table documentation page (AU_PRESCRIPTION) showing the table description, primary key, foreign key relationships, and the beginning of column-level documentation with name, type, and description fields.
Screenshot of the RxTracker Export Schema page showing the title, alphabetical index, and table listings.
Full-page screenshot of the ConnectEHR & CQMsolution EHI Export page showing C-CDA export instructions, QRDA I XML export description, and step-by-step process.
Full-page screenshot of the Patient Portal EHI Export page showing C-CDA export instructions and step-by-step report extraction process.
